name: Dipper Pines
info:
• 简体中文名: 迪普·派恩斯
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1999-08
  • 引用来源: http://gravityfalls.wikia.com/wiki/Dipper_Pines
detail: "Dipper" Pines is the protagonist of [Gravity Falls]. He is the younger twin brother (by five minutes) of Mabel Pines, and is a curious, clever, and inventive 12-year-old. With Mabel along for the ride, he endeavors to uncover the secrets in the mysterious town of Gravity Falls over the summer.
